# winBack

**Type Property**

A win-back offer for an auto-renewable subscription.

## Declaration

```swift
static let winBack: Product.SubscriptionOffer.OfferType
```

## Discussion

For information about win-back offers, see [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/supporting-win-back-offers-in-your-app].

## Getting offer types

- **introductory**: An introductory offer for an auto-renewable subscription.
- **promotional**: A promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription.
